channel.title: Posts on Virtual Innovation Consortium
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Virtual Innovation Consortium

item.title: Project Presentation
item.description: The project addresses Europe’s advanced digital skills gap, focusing on Extended Reality (XR) technologies like Augmented and Virtual Reality. By uniting higher education institutions, VET providers, industry, and research organisations, it will create a specialised Master’s Programme (ISCED Level 7, 120 ECTS), an advanced training programme with self-standing modules, and an annual Summer School.
